Large spade
Released6 July 2016 (Update)
MembersYes

High alch600 coins
Low alch400 coins
Weight3 kg
Advanced data
Item ID20164

The large spade is obtained after completing 500 easy Treasure Trails. It is considered a fun weapon.

It has a dig option, but clicking it results in the message Due to its sheer size, you just cannot angle it right to dig with it.

This item can be stored in the treasure chest of a costume room. If lost, it can be re-obtained by completing another easy clue scroll.

[[File:Large spade detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''large spade''' is obtained after completing 500 [[Clue scroll (easy)|easy]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It is considered a [[fun weapons|fun weapon]].

It has a dig option, but clicking it results in the message ''Due to its sheer size, you just cannot angle it right to dig with it.''

{{Costume storage|treasure chest}} If lost, it can be re-obtained by completing another [[easy clue scroll]].
